resource_dependency.externalAPISpec: APIs for retrieving real-time sports data and analytics

function: Fetch dynamic data from backend services to populate UI components.
static_description: The frontend displays various sections such as dashboards, player stats, team info, etc., populated via API calls. All interactive elements use dark goldenrod color while the background uses floral white.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on any link or button triggers an API call to fetch related data dynamically.

resource_dependency.databaseSchemaDefinition: Tables: users(id, username, email, password_hash), sessions(session_id, user_id, created_at), players(player_id, name, position, team_id), teams(team_id, name, manager_user_id, budget), statistics(stat_id, player_id, game_id, stat_type, value), games(game_id, home_team_id, away_team_id, date_played, score_home, score_away)

function: Connect to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables and support CRUD operations for application entities.
static_description: Backend server configured with connection pool settings pointing to PostgreSQL instance using specified credentials.

resource_dependency.statDataSchema: Fields: player_id (foreign key), season_year (integer), stat_category (enum), value (float)

function: Track and display detailed player performance metrics across multiple categories over time.
static_description: A dedicated page showing tabular and graphical representations of individual player statistics categorized by season/year.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting different seasons or categories updates the displayed statistics accordingly.
Hovering over chart points reveals additional context about specific statistic values.

resource_dependency.teamDataSchema: Fields: team_id (primary key), name (string), logo_url (string), roster (array of player_ids), budget (decimal)
resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Fields: transaction_id (primary key), team_id (foreign key), amount (decimal), description (text), timestamp (datetime)

function: Allow users to manage team composition and monitor financial status through intuitive interfaces.
static_description: Displays current team roster alongside editable fields for adding/removing players and adjusting budgets visually represented in charts.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Edit Roster' enables drag-and-drop reordering of players within the lineup.
Dragging players between bench and active roster slots modifies the team formation immediately.

resource_dependency.liveSimulationEngineAPI: WebSocket endpoint for streaming live game events
resource_dependency.gameSimulationLogic: Algorithm calculating outcomes based on player stats and strategic inputs

function: Simulate baseball games in real-time with visual feedback reflecting ongoing gameplay actions.
static_description: Visual representation of a baseball field with animated player movements synchronized with simulated play-by-play commentary.

interaction_and_states.description: Initiating simulation starts event stream updating scoreboard and field visuals every few seconds.
Scrolling through historical plays pauses/resumes live feed temporarily.

resource_dependency.userInputHandlers: Form validation logic ensuring only valid adjustments are accepted before applying changes

function: Enable users to modify tactical aspects like batting order and defensive placements affecting future simulations.
static_description: Interface displaying dropdown menus and sliders allowing customization of lineup positions and pitching rotations.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting new lineup selections stores updated configurations which influence subsequent game simulations.
Repositioning players directly on the lineup grid applies those changes instantly without requiring form submission.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignFramework: Bootstrap CSS framework integrated for cross-device compatibility

function: Implement consistent styling theme throughout the site adhering to requested color scheme and responsive layout standards.
static_description: All pages utilize floral white backgrounds complemented by dark goldenrod accents on buttons, links, and highlights ensuring readability and aesthetic appeal.

resource_dependency.databaseERD: Entity Relationship Diagram outlining relationships among Players, Teams, Games, Statistics tables
resource_dependency.schemaMigrationScripts: SQL scripts creating initial table structures and constraints

function: Establish foundational relational database structure capable of storing all relevant baseball-related information securely.
static_description: PostgreSQL schema includes normalized tables representing players, teams, games, and statistical records linked appropriately via foreign keys.

resource_dependency.sessionStorageMechanism: JWT tokens stored client-side in HTTP-only cookies

function: Secure access to personalized features through robust authentication and persistent session handling mechanisms.
static_description: Login/register forms appear when accessing protected routes unless valid session exists; otherwise redirect to dashboard.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon successful login, JWT token issued enabling continued access until expiration or explicit logout.

resource_dependency.aggregateQueryDefinitions: SQL queries aggregating recent wins/losses, upcoming matchups, top performers

function: Provide consolidated view summarizing key team indicators and scheduled activities for quick reference.
static_description: Dashboard presents cards summarizing win-loss ratio, next opponent preview, standout players, and pending matches.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on widgets navigates to full-detail views corresponding to selected summary item.

resource_dependency.archiveSearchFunctionality: Indexed search bar returning past games filtered by date/team/player criteria
resource_dependency.historicalDataViews: Tabbed navigation switching between game logs, seasonal summaries, career milestones

function: Archive historical match results and associated player performances facilitating retrospective analysis.
static_description: Archive section displays chronological list of completed games enriched with condensed box scores and notable achievements.

interaction_and_states.description: Typing keywords filters matching entries instantly refining displayed dataset.

resource_dependency.notificationSystem: Toast-style alerts notifying significant moments like home runs or lead changes

function: Deliver immediate notifications and continuous progress updates throughout live game scenarios enhancing engagement.
static_description: During simulations, floating banners announce major developments atop standard play progression timeline.

interaction_and_states.description: Each SSE message triggers DOM update refreshing relevant sections like scoreboard or commentary panel.
